title: Fall 2015 Commencement Banquet
desc: HIU's Fall 2015 Commencement Banquet will be held in the Darling Pavilion of the Lawson Fulton Student Center. Doors open for check in at 6:00 p.m. Academic honors for all programs will be awarded. Graduates receiving Masters Degrees should bring their hood and gown (no cap) for the hooding ceremony.? There is no cost to the graduates for the banquet, but they must register and RSVP for the event by Dec 1. Family and friends may attend at a cost of $25.00 per person. Attendance is by reservation only. Contact Sandy Printy at sprinty@hiu.edu for any requests regarding handicapped seating or seating with friends.? Free parking is available in the Commonwealth Avenue lot and the Titan Drive lot.
